snippet: More than 500 years later, Richard III will now lie in hallowed ground, but his reputation still wanders the earth.
abstract: Editorial on discovery of King Richard III's bones, found buried under parking lot in Leicester, England; notes that his remains will be reinterred in hallowed ground, but suggests that his reputation still wanders the earth, looking for resolution.
lead_paragraph: More than 500 years later, Richard III will now lie in hallowed ground, but his reputation still wanders the earth.
